remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立事件查詢:"選取 \* 從 __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 10 其中 TargetInstance ISA Win32_Service"，其會將傳送通知的建立**Win32_Service**執行個體，並在 10 秒輪詢間隔。The following example creates the event query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 10 WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_Service ", which sends notification of the creation of **Win32_Service** instances, with a 10-second polling interval. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立事件查詢:"選取 \* 從 __InstanceCreationEvent 其中 TargetInstance ISA Win32_NTLogEvent 群組內 600 由 TargetInstance.SourceName HAVING NumberOfEvents > 15 」 可提供彙總事件，如果數字，只**Win32_NTLogEvent**來自相同來源收到事件超過 15 個。The following example creates the event query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_NTLogEvent GROUP WITHIN 600 BY TargetInstance.SourceName HAVING NumberOfEvents > 15" which delivers aggregate events only if the number of **Win32_NTLogEvent** events received from the same source exceeds 15. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to events of the specified class.

span.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to events of the specified class.

value.span: 傳回值，包含在事件或多個條件的查詢。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的條件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new condition. ## 屬性值Property Value 條件會表示為字串，包含一或多個子句，格式為： \\<運算子 >\<值 > 結合邏輯運算子。The condition is represented as a string, containing one or more clauses of the form: \ \ \ combined with logical operators. \ 必須代表這項查詢中指定的事件類別上定義的屬性。\ must represent a property defined on the event class specified in this query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新並顯示事件查詢字串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition/cs/WqlEventQuery_Condition.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_Condition/vb/WqlEventQuery_Condition.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the interval to be used for grouping events of the same type.

span.span: Gets or sets the interval to be used for grouping events of the same type.

value.span: 傳回值，其中包含用來劃分相同型別的事件群組的間隔。

span.span: Returns a value containing the interval used for grouping events of the same type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的間隔。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval. ## 屬性值Property Value Null，如果沒有任何群組涉及;否則，wmi 的間隔應該群組相同類型的事件。Null, if there is no grouping involved; otherwise, the interval in which WMI should group events of the same type. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新並顯示事件查詢字串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. summary.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.

span.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.

value.span: 傳回值，其中包含套用至事件，根據接收的事件數目的彙總的條件。

span.span: Returns a value containing the condition applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的分組條件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new grouping condition. ## 屬性值Property Value 如果為 null，應該套用任何彙總或沒有條件;否則，表單的條件"NumberOfEvents\<運算子 >\<值 > 」。Null, if no aggregation or no condition should be applied; otherwise, a condition of the form "NumberOfEvents \ \". ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新並顯示事件查詢字串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. summary.span: Gets or sets the polling interval to be used in this query.

span.span: Gets or sets the polling interval to be used in this query.

value.span: 傳回值，其中包含的輪詢間隔，使用在 「 事件查詢。

span.span: Returns a value containing the polling interval used in the event query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只應該在情況下設定沒有任何*事件提供者*針對要求的事件，並且 WMI 必須輪詢要求條件。This property should only be set in cases where there is no *event provider* for the event requested, and WMI is required to poll for the requested condition. 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的間隔。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval. ## 屬性值Property Value Null，如果沒有任何輪詢涉及;否則，有效輪詢是否需要值。Null, if there is no polling involved; otherwise, a valid value if polling is required. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化新代表查詢:"選取 \* 從 __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 1 WHERE TargetInstance ISA 'win32_process'"。The following example initializes a new that represents the query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 1 WHERE TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_Process'". [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval/cs/WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval/vb/WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval.vb#1)]
